page.title: 17Transport in Chorleywood
page.content: We made a questionaire and surveyed 45 people about where they worked and what transport they used to get there. We foud out that most people worl in London and travel by car and train to work, while a few who work in Chorleywood walk to their employment. Of the 45 people 19 worked in London, 5 in Chorleywood and the rest elsewhere. (This compares to the 80 children in the top two years of the Russell School. Only 3 of their parents worked in Chorleywood, and well over half in London). Of the 45 people surveyed it would seem the busiest morning train is the 7.52am and in the evening the 6.00pm from Baker Street.
